HostBlizzard is a privately owned Canadian web hosting company dedicated to providing reliable, affordable and quality shared hosting, reseller hosting and VPS hosting services to customers all over the world. Our mission has been to provide superior service, fast and friendly support and affordable web hosting solutions to individuals and businesses alike.

All HostBlizzard services are backed by our technical support; 100% available, 24 hours a day, 7 days a week and 365 days a year.


-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-
VPS FEATURES
-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-
  • OpenStack KVM
  • SSD RAID Protected Disks
  • On-Demand Scalability
  • Anti-DDoS Protection Included
  • 24x7x365 Technical Support
  • Extra IP Addresses: Add up to 256 IPs per VPS server. $3 each per month.
-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-
CLOUD SSD VPS

HostBlizzard Cloud VPS servers are hosted using a OpenStack KVM architecture. Deploy a server in one of many regions we have available. Add one or more disks to complement the SSD storage space already included. We also happily design custom cloud solutions of any size.

-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-
We Guarantee Your Satisfaction!
-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-

Q: What form of payments do you accept?
A: We accept Credit Card, PayPal, Cryptocurrency and Interac e-Transfer.

Q: How am I billed?
A: You will be billed monthly on the anniversary of the date you registered for the server. You will only be billed for the cloud servers you deploy and the data transfer used in the previous month.

Q: Do you have a refund policy?
A: If you are unhappy with your cloud server with HostBlizzard for any reason or just wish to close the account at anytime during the first 7 days, you will get a refund of all hosting fees paid.
